creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: white buildings with red roofs and palm trees in distance in middle ground; orange and brown mountain peaks topped with white and orange buildings at top of image; brilliant blue sky
marks: Signature, Title and Date LLC in bottom margin, in black: [Tiruchchirappalli
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Tiruchchirappalli
